actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the private activity bond volume cap for States which do not make medical assistance available for medicare cost-sharing for qualified medicare beneficiaries.

summary.text: Amends tax-exempt bond provisions of the Internal Revenue Code to set a State private activity bond volume cap of zero for States that do not make medical assistance under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act available for Medicare cost-sharing for qualified Medicare beneficiaries.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the private activity bond volume cap for States which do not make medical assistance available for medicare cost-sharing for qualified medicare beneficiaries.
